fieldDescription: Generates custom star systems during new game creation. [Disabling this will disable all custom star systems, including the default star system occupied by the Adversary faction. Edit the settings.json in the Adversary mod folder if you wish to disable individual custom star systems instead.]
Enables the Adversary to switch fleet composition and doctrines mid-game.
How many months between each Adversary doctrine changes?
Enables the Adversary to steal and use blueprints from certain factions. [If this feature is disabled mid-game, the Adversary faction will continue to use any stolen blueprints.]
How many months between each Adversary blueprint steals?
